queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `person` (`id` INT NOT NULL, `name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',`lastname` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) COLLATE='latin1_spanish_ci';
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `producto` ( `id` INT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT, `desc` TEXT, `precio` INTEGER DEFAULT 0, `stock` INTEGER DEFAULT 1, PRIMARY KEY(`id`) );
